quote: Yet only the atrocities of the conquered are referred to as criminal acts; those of the conqueror are justified as necessary, heroic, and even worse, as the fulfillment of God's will.
quote_letters: YET ONLY THE ATROCITIES OF THE CONQUERED ARE REFERRED TO AS CRIMINAL ACTS THOSE OF THE CONQUEROR ARE JUSTIFIED AS NECESSARY HEROIC AND EVEN WORSE AS THE FULFILLMENT OF GODS WILL
